feed.title: questions about bitcoin-XT code fork & non-consensus hard-fork

entry.title: questions about bitcoin-XT code fork & non-consensus hard-fork
entry.summary: The email thread from June 15, 2015, between Mike Hearn and Bryan is discussing the issue of miscommunication and technical misunderstandings. Bryan expresses his concern that if Mike is not taking care with reading and interpreting messages accurately, it could lead to significant issues when evaluating consensus changes in Bitcoin. He encourages Mike to evaluate messages and source code carefully. The conversation also touches on the topic of whether Mike is a programmer or not, with Bryan suggesting that everyone has known Mike is a programmer since he built CIA.vc. The email highlights the importance of clear communication in the world of Bitcoin and the potential consequences of technical miscommunication.
